steps.plaintext: Give Xamaran some of the Adjuvant's power
steps.markdown: Give Xamaran some of the ◀Adjuvant▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Lumenstone_Adjuvant▷'s power

substeps.plaintext: This costs 5 bars of the Lumenstone Adjuvant's power.
substeps.markdown: This costs 5 bars of the Lumenstone Adjuvant's power.

steps.plaintext: Help Xamaran clear the foul energy out
steps.markdown: Help Xamaran clear the foul energy out

substeps.plaintext: Use the Lumenstone Adjuvant to clear 3 Oozing Concretions in the area.
substeps.markdown: Use the Lumenstone Adjuvant to clear 3 ◀Oozing Concretions▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Oozing_Concretions▷ in the area.

steps.plaintext: Tell Xamaran that the foul energy has been cleansed
steps.markdown: Tell Xamaran that the foul energy has been cleansed

substeps.plaintext: Each recharge expends 1 bar of the Lumenstone Adjuvant's power.
substeps.markdown: Each recharge expends 1 bar of the Lumenstone Adjuvant's power.

steps.plaintext: Follow the water's flow and search for the source of the foul energy
steps.markdown: Follow the water's flow and search for the source of the foul energy

substeps.plaintext: Follow the river upstream to reach the source
substeps.markdown: Follow the river upstream to reach the source

steps.plaintext: Use the Blessings of Wisdom on the source of the foul energy
steps.markdown: Use the Blessings of Wisdom on the source of the foul energy

substeps.plaintext: Use Lumenstone Adjuvant (2 bars) to remove the Oozing Concretion.
substeps.markdown: Use Lumenstone Adjuvant (2 bars) to remove the Oozing Concretion.

substeps.plaintext: Interact with the spot quickly to use the  Blessings of Wisdom. A Precious Chest will appear.
substeps.markdown: Interact with the spot quickly to use the <img:blessings_of_wisdom> ◀Blessings of Wisdom▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Blessings_of_Wisdom▷. A ◀Precious Chest▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Precious_Chest▷ will appear.

steps.plaintext: Tell Xamaran that the foul energy's source has been cleared out
steps.markdown: Tell Xamaran that the foul energy's source has been cleared out
